## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please ensure:

- [ ] Code builds without errors: `npm run build`
- [ ] Linting passes: `npm run lint`
- [ ] Code is formatted: `npm run format`
- [ ] Dependency check passes: `npm run deps:check`
- [ ] All tests pass: `npm test`
- [ ] E2E tests pass: `npm run test:e2e`
- [ ] Test coverage is above 90%: `npm run test:coverage`
- [ ] JSDoc added for exported classes, methods, and interfaces
- [ ] No debug code, commented-out code, or TODO comments without context
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional commit format
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
